PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2021-10702021-12-23,  ,  PMO,  , 
ActOfficial Residences Act
SubjectYen Chanthy Som ** Appointment **
PrecisOrder (1) appointing YEN CHANTHY SOM, to be Chef at the Prime Minister's residence; and (2) fixing his remuneration and conditions of employment.
AttachmentsAttachment
